Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 79th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription:
Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to police activity at 79th/Dan Ryan.
Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to police activity at 79th/Dan Ryan.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
